participant_1.background:
I am close to my parents, but we are not very similar.
I live in a small apartment with my cat Charlie, but I dream of having a house with a big yard so they can run around.
I'm a bit nervous about going to the baby shower because I'm worried about being stared at.
I have no use for a crib, but I would love to have a music studio in my dorm room.
I've been with my current partner for three years, and we're going strong.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars.
i am an environmental activist.
I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband.
I plan to relax on the weekend and not think too much.

content.text: What are you up to this weekend?
I'm going to a comic con with my husband.
Cool! I've never been to one before. What's it like?
It's a lot of fun! There are people dressed up as their favorite characters, vendors selling all kinds of geeky stuff, and panels with actors and creators.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I might have to check one out sometime.
I definitely recommend it! It's a great way to meet other people who share your interests.
I think I would enjoy that. I'm always looking for new ways to meet people.
Well, you're welcome to join us if you want!
I'll have to think about it. I'm not sure I'm ready to dress up as a character yet.
You don't have to dress up if you don't want to! It's just a lot of fun to see all the different costumes.
Well, I'll definitely keep it in mind.
Great! We always have a blast.
Do you go to a lot of them?
Yeah, we try to go to at least one a year. We usually go to the one in San Diego, but we've also been to a few others in different cities.
That's awesome! I'm sure you've seen some really cool stuff.
We have! We've seen some really amazing cosplays, and we've met some really cool people.
That's awesome! I'm sure I would have a lot of fun at one.
You definitely would! It's a great way to escape from the real world for a little bit and just have some fun.
I need to do that more often.
It's never too late to start
